it.polito.verifoo.rest.common

Class TranslatorBasic

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polito.verifoo.rest.common.Translator
      • it.polito.verifoo.rest.common.TranslatorBasic

  • public class TranslatorBasic
extends Translator
    This class implements a parser for verifoo output (the z3 model), in order to translate it into the correct XML. This extension is needed to parse a model that include the BASIC autoconfiguraion
